news.title: Week 3 Results Are In
news.content: All Week 3 games have been completed and scores updated. Check out the latest standings and see who's leading the pack! Several teams are making strong moves up the rankings.
news.summary: Week 3 fantasy matchups complete with updated standings and rising teams to watch.

news.title: New Player Records Section
news.content: The record book now includes a new Players section tracking the most and fewest unique players used by teams across seasons. Minimum game requirements apply for fair comparison.
news.summary: Enhanced record tracking with new player statistics and game-based minimums for accurate comparisons.

news.title: 2025 Season Kickoff
news.content: Welcome to the 2025 fantasy football season! All systems are updated and ready to track your league's performance throughout the season.
news.summary: Everything is ready for another exciting year of fantasy football competition.

news.title: Enhanced Record Book
news.content: The record book has been expanded with new categories and improved tooltips for better context on achievements and records.
news.summary: More detailed record tracking with enhanced context and achievement categories.

news.title: Mobile Experience Improved
news.content: Better mobile responsiveness has been added across all pages for improved viewing on phones and tablets.
news.summary: Enhanced mobile experience with improved responsive design across all pages.

news.title: Data Sync Complete
news.content: All historical data from 2019-2024 has been synchronized and is available for viewing in standings, games, and records.
news.summary: Complete historical data integration spanning six seasons of league history.
